name: Bug Battle (itch) (franc246)
description:
Bug Battle is a space-themed 3D FPS, where the objective is to reach the portal at the end of the level to progress.

Modifications:

- Added custom music for standard level and boss level

-Created an interesting comprehensive level

-Changed Boss battle health display

-Changed Boss behavior

-Changed Main menu buttons

Made by: Rob Francis

Credits to: Dr. Brian Winn and MSU CAS117
